function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of self-protection measures such as wearing face masks, hand washing, and ventilation","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and external spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Education and enforcement of self-protection measures, promotion of guidelines and best practices","Technologies":"Education campaigns, enforcement policies, ventilation systems","People":"General population, especially those in close contact with infected individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to maintaining distance from patients with a fever","Impact":"Risk of direct transmission and spread of the virus to individuals in close proximity","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, enforcement of quarantine and isolation measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, public health messaging platforms","People":"General population, individuals in close proximity to patients with a fever","Owner":"Government, health authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inaccurate understanding or implementation of effective self-protection measures","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in mitigating risk of infection and spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Education and training on proper self-protection measures, dissemination of accurate information","Technologies":"Online training platforms, educational resources, information dissemination tools","People":"General population, individuals undertaking self-protection measures","Owner":"Health authorities, educational institutions"}]}
